articles.description: Russian cosmonauts Oleg Artemyev, Denis Matveev and Sergey Korsakov launched aboard a Soyuz MS-21 spacecraft from the Baikonur Cosmodrome launchpad in Kazakhstan around 11:55 a.m. ET. The trip to the space station should take just over three hours.
